abstract: A problem at the Nasdaq stock market halted trading in all Nasdaq-listed stocks on Thursday. Nasdaq began reopening stocks for trading soon after 3 p.m.
snippet: A problem at the Nasdaq stock market halted trading in all Nasdaq-listed stocks on Thursday. Nasdaq began reopening stocks for trading soon after 3 p.m.
lead_paragraph: Updated, 9:39 p.m. | The United States stock market showed again on Thursday that it remained vulnerable to technological breakdowns even as regulators and market operators work to keep up with trading that is increasingly electronic and driven by speed.

headline.main: Pricing Problem Suspends Nasdaq for Three Hours
headline.print_headline: Pricing Problem Suspends NASDAQ For Three Hours
